main.remarks: ToolHostOptions configures how Tool operates hosted services.

property.name: ServicesStartConcurrently
property.summary: If True services are started concurrently.

property.name: ServicesStopConcurrently
property.summary: If True services are stopped concurrently.

property.name: StartupTimeout
property.summary: Time to wait for services to start.

property.name: ShutdownTimeout
property.summary: Time wait for services to stop.
